bullets: Ingests 12 operational data domains
5 intelligence layers: Performance Report, Pulse, Benchmark, Watchtower, Insights
Conversational AI for plain-English data questions
hero.headline: Decision Intelligence for Restaurants
hero.subheadline: Turn fragmented operational signals into daily actions through real-time Pulse, benchmarking, and automated insights.

modules.blurb: Anonymized industry benchmarking — the STR model for restaurants. Seven sections with network-effect data moat.
bullets: RevPASH, Seat Occupancy, Average Check, Total Revenue with compset median and percentile rankings
Financial, Operational, Space & Rent, Revenue Mix, Daypart Heatmap tabs
4W/8W/12W period selector with your-line vs. compset median and P25-P75 band
AI-driven predictive analytics (Forecast)
Market-level benchmarking
modules.name: Benchmark

modules.blurb: Conversational AI interface with 4 intelligence modes — ask any question about your restaurant data in plain English.
bullets: Natural language query interface with three-panel layout
4 intelligence modes: Chat, Monitor, Analyst, Strategist
NL-to-SQL conversion and execution
Structured visual responses (KPI cards, charts, analysis cards, tables, HTML reports)
Voice input, conversation folders, scheduled queries, shareable links
modules.name: Sundae Intelligence

modules.blurb: 12 deep analytics modules across every operational domain.
bullets: Revenue Intelligence — sales deep-dive with menu mix, daypart timing, channel segments
Labor Intelligence — scheduling optimization, overtime alerts, SPLH tracking
Inventory Intelligence — usage tracking, waste analysis, par level monitoring
Purchasing Intelligence — cost tracking, vendor comparison, procurement optimization
Profit Intelligence — prime cost, break-even, margin analysis
Revenue Assurance — void/discount patterns, cash control, anomaly detection
Cross-Intelligence — cross-domain correlations, auto-enables at 3+ modules
modules.name: Insights

modules.blurb: Historical analytics foundation. Six report tabs covering full sales performance: Overview, Revenue Mix, Category Performance, Tender Mix, Daypart Analysis, Guest Counting.
bullets: 6 report tabs (Overview, Revenue Mix, Category Performance, Tender Mix, Daypart Analysis, Guest Counting)
Interactive charts (area, bar, pie, line, radial bar)
Multi-restaurant selector with segment filtering
Date range comparison (vs. last year, last month, custom)
Monthly target setting with proration
modules.name: Performance Report

modules.blurb: Real-time operations command center with 17 sub-pages.
bullets: Hero pace bar with adaptive AI targets and hourly breakdown
Active staff tracking with SPLH and break compliance
Bottleneck detection across KITCHEN/HOST/POS zones
Void/refund/discount/comp anomaly detection with per-employee patterns
86'd items, critical low, prep shortage, velocity tracking
modules.name: Pulse

modules.blurb: External market and competitive intelligence engine with 4 sections.
bullets: AI-generated morning briefing with context KPI strip (weather/events/revenue)
Prioritized action items and unified signal feed
Google Places competitor discovery with configurable radius
Competitor tracking with ratings history and review themes
Sentiment landscape analysis and alert feed
modules.name: Watchtower

plans.name: Report Lite
plans.note: Free forever — upload POS data and get instant benchmarking. 250 AI credits included.

plans.name: Report Plus
plans.note: AI-parsed data ingestion with deeper analysis. 1,200 AI credits, 5 seats.

plans.name: Report Pro
plans.note: Automated daily ingestion with advanced AI insights. 3,500 AI credits, 10 seats.

plans.name: Core Lite
plans.note: Real-time operational intelligence with 15-minute refresh. Modules available as add-ons.

plans.name: Core Pro
plans.note: Full intelligence stack with 5-minute refresh, multi-POS, and all intelligence modes.

plans.name: Enterprise
plans.note: Complete platform with custom SLAs, dedicated support, and white-label options.

bullets: 179+ data models in the platform
200+ backend services
100+ frontend pages
12 distinct data domains ingested
15 registered AI routes
22 production modules
17 sub-pages in Pulse
12 Insights deep analytics modules
